topics.body:
dream i had 4 yrs ago, had to write it quickly b4 i forgotted it

a shot

turns u into a ghost/phantom

hotel room   family      haunted       i asked the son behind the bed    he asks what do u like the most  i say the dark   and i say thtd be awesome if u could turn me into a ghost    he cuts an anarchy symbol on the back of my elbow he tells me to place my hand over it so i do and my skin starts disengrating away into thin air and i turn into a ghost (damaged  by light)

I couldnt become a ghost anymore... I mightve forgotten how to 

to get ghost powers again this guy tells me to eat this meat (grilled) and wierd food cauliflower looking which is yellow taste pretty good then he says ask ur self what do u wanna be the most  then he tells me to sleep

this wierd shrine   i place (soul) gems on it and become a monster of sorts

Inner Voices: Our Coreword mission has not changed only our target,
